issue.title: [CF 1367] Bloodthirsty Instinct duration
issue.body:
Hi, I am unable to create an icon for Bloodthirsty Instinct duration. I tried using "buff/debuff" item cooldown spell cooldown unit cooldown internal cooldown... Can anyone please help how to setup this? I feel like it should be easy? 

 

I just add "show timer" for the option and added the bloodthirsty instinct name/ID and that did not work for any of the category. Please help, thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user riki329 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1367 | Raw

comments.body:
For the buff/debuff version, you'd need to set it to track Blood Frenzy (which is the buff that BTI gives you when it procs).  Same for if you did it using an ICD tracker (though the buff version works fine here).  Here's an example setup: http://puu.sh/tqf9t/f43b66e695.png

Edited Jan 18, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Kaedys
